job.title: Machine Learning Data Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: <strong><u>Job Description<br></u></strong><ul><li>100% REMOTE***<br></li></ul>We're looking for a Machine Learning Data Engineer with an affinity for machine learning infrastructure and model development. Excellent opportunity to work for a leading eCommerce organization in a role with full remote flexibility!<br><br><strong><u>Responsibilities Of The Machine Learning Data Engineer<br><br></u></strong><ul><li>Prototype and research ML features</li><li>Drive ML solutions in Spark and Tensorflow to production</li><li>Present and communicate internally and externally</li><li>Participate in continuous improvement of team's engineering processes and infrastructure</li><li>Mentor and coach junior engineers and participate in code and design reviews</li></ul> <strong>Requirements of the Machine Learning Data Engineer:<br></strong><ul><li>Demonstrated ability to analyze large data sets and identify gaps</li><li>Ability to design and deploy solutions in a Hadoop environment</li><li>Proficiency in Java and Linux environments</li><li>Basic ML knowledge<br></li></ul>Keywords: Data Engineer, Machine Learning, ML, Spark, Tensorflow, eCommerce, 100% Remote<br><br>Job ID: 352986<br><br>
